name: KaamKaaj
tag_list: kaamkaaj, employment, recruitment, exchange, employment-exchange, placement, jobs, skilled, general-graduates
overview:
www.KaamKaaj.in is an Indian localized job portal and online employment and recruitment exchange for all general graduates and skilled professionals (un-organized workforce).

KaamKaaj provides a combination of physical (offices with support staff) and internet based employment and recruitment exchange. Currently active in North India

As the name KaamKaaj suggests, it gives the unskilled, semi-skilled, skilled workers as well as general graduates a platform to register, post and advertise their skills and Resumes and search for all kinds of local and out of town jobs. The unorganized workforce of India, throughout the length and breadth of the country, has extraordinary self confidence and ability to work hard and fulfill their dreams. They have been lacking any medium for fast access to jobs.

KaamKaaj helps candidates find their dream Jobs and advertise their skills. Secondly it helps the companies, SMEs and individuals to post their job openings and find relevant candidates. KaamKaaj is a portal that connects people together and provides more opportunities in searching for relevant jobs instantly.
